Did not fit me. I have a small head/face, but these were far wiser than any other pair of glasses I own. And I own 18 pairs. They are great otherwise.

soooo cute, they look so fancy and pretty sturdy. Love love fhese so much you need them

评论概述: MY FAVORITE GLASSES OF ALL TIME.

I love that the lenses are pink 🩷 and will keep them for my sunset bike rides but they are more flat looking than rounded to your face like the photos.  Not fashionable.  Very tinny gold, sharper molded frames, just ok. They are Halloween quality glasses.  No UV protection. Keep looking if you're going for style vs. just fun.

评论概述: cool sunglasses but material looks cheap
评论详情: These sunglasses are so Y2K!! The design is so pretty and it looks really cool. The only thing I don't really like is that the material looks really cheap. I don't know if its metal or something else but I truly think that if you applied the tiniest pressure to them, they would 100% break. They look really cool from afar, too! They're really lightweight and they haven't left any marks on my face after using them. For the price, these are okay!

评论概述: Style is great but looks cheap
评论详情: Style is really cool but the quality isn’t sturdy and looks cheap
These went well with my look for my evening I definitely like the shades a lot

For the price this is a cute pair of glasses.  It is lightweight, comes with a cleaning cloth and fabric case to protect the lenses from getting scratched if you throw them in your purse or store in car.  I have only had them for a couple of days but a few of my friends have complimented me on the look.  I wanted a clear lenses pair of knock around sunglasses to bring on a trip to Mexico without worry about leaving or losing them at the pool/beach.  The price is right on point.
Works as expected. Made of good durable quality materials. Can't wait to get more use out of it! Price value is good for the money.
I love these glasses. I got the brown with gold frames & clear with silver frames. They're  light weight & feel great. I'm sure I'll be getting more as spring comes on............

This is a great pair of sunglasses.  They come with a case and cleaning cloth.  The frames are a good size and are not too tight.  I have a larger head/face and these do not leave marks or feel tight when wearing. They also don't look huge or like a fad.  I like they way they look while I am wearing them.  They do a wonderful job of blocking the bright sunlight.  I am happy to wear these.

These are really elegant sunglasses/fashion glasses at a great price point.  No glitz, no sparkle just gorgeous extra large pink lenses in a minimalist gold-toned frame that pays a nod to wrap arounds.  I don’t see UV rated anywhere in the listing so I’d say don’t count on that kind of protection out of doors.  But they really are a stunning pair of glasses.  Lightweight and a bit delicate looking, more for fashion than anything else.
These glasses are so cute. Definitely y2k vibes. They are a little light so I’d  be careful with handling them but overall I love them for the look and price! Came with a dust bag and cleaning cloth.

These sunglasses are super cute. They are definitely a fashion statement and less for sun protection. They are the perfect amount of extra to add to any outfit. They quality is great, they are dainty yet sturdy. I did see a bit of scratch marks of them straight out of the packaging but I'm not to bother about them.

评论概述: NIce retro-looking sunglasses with rose color lenses
评论详情: I got these as a gift to a friend who tends to look at life as if through rose-colored glasses.  (A very old saying).  They are well built, certainly rose-colored, and look better than the pictures.

评论概述: Cute and Y2K inspired, but cheap
评论详情: The metal is so thin that I'm not even sure it's metal, it really feels like plastic and I'm sure it would break easily with some pressure applied. However, it doesn't matter to other people or from afar. The sunglasses are still really cute and look good on everyone. They worked for both me and my brother. I think they feel a bit cheap for $14.99 but they're definitely very cute shades.

These things are awesome! They are sleek, stylish, and very fashionable! They also help protect my eyes in the harsh sun! I highly recommend these to anybody looking for eye protection or heck just to look good!
These glasses look great and are heavy. BUT they are very large-very wide on my face. I'm looking for someone to take them since they are nice.
These are super cute for style and for people who don't need much tin
Stylish pair of sunglasses. It is comfortable and lightweight.
Love these glasses. They’re sleek and sexy looking. Love the frame shape.
Very cute Y2k glasses with the right outfit! It's a bit thinner and cheaper feeling than I expected but definitely not bad for the price! They look so good, definitely recommend!
